description: Masks must be worn in all enclosed public spaces amid hundreds of active clusters of Covid-19.
title: Coronavirus: Masks mandatory in France amid fresh outbreaks
title_page: Coronavirus: Masks mandatory in France amid fresh outbreaks - BBC News
maintext: Other regions are also worrying authorities. Brittany in the north-west of France has a reproduction number of 2.6 - meaning each infected person is passing on the virus to nearly three more. The eastern department of Vosges is also seeing rising cases, while the R number in Marseille and Nice is reportedly at 1.55.
